entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 then diminishing to 20 late this afternoon. High 18. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
